metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23556 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package guake before 3.8.5 are vulnerable to Exposed Dangerous Method or Function due to the exposure of execute_command and execute_command_by_uuid methods via the d-bus interface, which makes it possible for a malicious user to run an arbitrary command via the d-bus method. **Note:** Exploitation requires the user to have installed another malicious program that will be able to send dbus signals or run terminal commands.

criterions.comment: guake package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
